doc.title: Wealth Creator
doc.plot: The Wealth Creator TV Show is the first and only TV show in Australia that specifically focuses on wealth and success through entrepreneurship and investing. Hear from self-made millionaires, who have featured in Wealth Creator magazine, who will educate you on the finer points of wealth, investing and entrepreneurship. Each episode host Reuben Buchanan (Founder - Wealth Creator Magazine ) interviews leading entrepreneurs and industry experts in the areas of business, investment, finance and success. Each show concludes with a lifestyle segment showcasing sought-after cars, boats, properties and other prestige toys.
